title: Phygital Hub for Local NFTs & DAOOH
description: F6 NFT projects face expensive local unawareness and adoption; just as the contents of nearby businesses, initiatives, creators and groups.

f6_assessments.q0: Cardano could be benefited from what you propose, but it will be too high of a level to have effective use and create value. It would be perfect to have a benefit-opportunity mapping that gives granular details about the potential of the idea and how it could generate value. But overall congratulations for the submission and please continue 😉
f6_assessments.q1: As a general recommendation, I would say that might be a good idea to have more details on the tactics, activities, and events rationale. Will help the reader understanding the concept
f6_assessments.q2:
Your idea proposal was interesting to read. Thank you for sharing. To make this proposal more relevant to the Cardano community, please consider the following suggestions: 
- The presentation of the idea has some shortcomings: the key success factors and overall business model. Why specific partners or specific actions? Also a more clear overview of the underlying principles will help us to understand where the idea and project will go. Overall seems very good 👍

As a general recommendation, I would say that might be a good idea to have more details on the tactics, activities, and events rationale. Will help the reader understanding the concept.

f6_assessments.q0: I've read your proposal and reviewed your website and feel this meets the Challenge of driving business use cases utilizing NFT and DAO implementations. I 'Strongly Agree' this meets the challenge
f6_assessments.q1: Having over 10 years as a PMP (Project Management Professional) I have reviewed your proposal and your website.  I'm not convinced that you will achieve the rates of adoption you have stated. Although I do believe that over time you can gain enough momentum to have the impact on the Cardano ecosystem we are hoping for. Your budget seems a little low, even though I see you are re-utilizing existing equipment, if I were a company I would want modern equipment and displays. After reviewing your  website I do like the participate of a lot of young minds that should bring energy and enthusiasm to this project.  You mention local Government Funding but did not describe what this funding would be or local Government regulations that may present a challenge to your project.  I expect you will need additional funding in future funds. However, even with my previous comments I do believe in your project. I'm marking it 'I Agree'
f6_assessments.q2: Given your milestones in this proposal I believe you will be able to report back to the voting community on your successes and challenges. I'm looking forward to watching your progression.  I'm assessing 'I Agree'

f6_assessments.q0: An excellent usecase for NFTs that utilizes their capabilities, is beneficial for many people and can foster the growth of Cardano in South America.
f6_assessments.q1: A very detailed plan is presented, the proposers are very transparent about themselves and the funds asked are very low, which clearly shows the honest motivation of the proposers.
f6_assessments.q2: With the very detailed description and timeline and the contactable proposers the auditing of the proposal should be very feasible.

f6_assessments.q0: What strikes me immediately with this proposal is the energy and enthusiasm with which they have launched into their project. The potential to add value to the Cardano ecosystem is certainly present. The problem they have identified is valid and the concept of a co-operative to unify resources makes good sense.
f6_assessments.q1: I always like to see a project that has already been formed and has already begun the journey to implementation before funding has even been achieved. This for me represents commitment to the cause and confidence in the end goals. This team ticks that box. The plan is comprehensive and is logical with reasonable budget that is broken down into reviewable steps.
f6_assessments.q2: The information that has been provided is excellent with perhaps one minor drawback. Due to the extensive nature of the information it would benefit from a concise summary. Not all voters will have time to read through it all. The team would do well to  work on layout design and adopt a tough edit stance to appeal to all Catalyst community voters. That is a minor issue however, and so back to the positives that include reasonable metrics/KPI'ss that are measurable, realistic budget and potential scalability once the model is proven.

solution: Phygital Hub that supports local P2P adoption/minting of ADA and NFT uses/contents; which are broadcasted to public spaces through DAOOH.
experience:
Leading the adoption of NFT uses within localities at Chile. 

Cultural, Business, UX and App managers; coursing at EMURGO.

DAOOH pioneers.
